thread.title: South's first cat cafe opens in Bournemouth tomorrow
thread.title_full: South's first cat cafe opens in Bournemouth tomorrow | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: South's first cat cafe opens in Bournemouth tomorrow

organizations.name: animals cats cat cafe bournemouth dorset

text:
Welcome to the new cat cafe The South's first ever cat cafe opens its doors tomorrow. It's a concept that's popular in Far Eastern countries - the idea being that the stresses of urban life can be more easily forgotten if you spend some quality time in the company of cats.
Martin Dowse joined some specially invited customers for a sneak peak before the grand opening, to see what they, and the twelve resident rescue cats, would make of it..
Play video Last updated Thu 16 Feb 2017 Animals Cats Cat Cafe Bournemouth Dorset
